Reviews.Title: This Cell Works Great
Reviews.Author: Mizerello
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these cells to replace T-Mobile's Shadow phone, which while it had great options, ate batteries to the point that we never used them. The Motorola set up for us with no problems. We inserted our sim cards and we were good to go.  We've had the phones for about 3 months now and have had no problems. A charged battery lasts sometimes up to 4 days. Texting is easy and the screen and keypad work well for people who need glasses. It goes online easily and quickly and games download with no problems.  Maybe we've been lucky, but so far this phone has out performed the Shadow hands down!

Reviews.Title: unlocked cellphone
Reviews.Author: Mikhail A. Migunkov
Reviews.Content: Good battery life, light , good key pad.Not good sound quality, every time after charging when I unplug it - it's turn off power.I not recommended this phone.

Reviews.Title: Razr V3
Reviews.Author: R. Conn "SlimWizard"
Reviews.Content: I have had several Razrs over the past 5 years and still stay w/ it because of the features and ease of use.  Even w/ so many new phones that have come out I would pick the Razr again and agian...

Reviews.Title: Motorola RAZR V3 Unlocked Phone with Camera, and Video...
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I bought it and I had to return it because the battery doesn't fit right on the contacts.  Then I bought another one and had to return it too for the same issue.

Reviews.Title: It is performed pretty bad
Reviews.Author: kmshetty
Reviews.Content: This product performed pretty bad. Battery never stayed even for few hours even from the start. I had purchased for presenting to somebody but ending up with very bad present!

Reviews.Title: Razr
Reviews.Author: Gabe
Reviews.Content: I had this phone previously one time and i enjoyed it.  However they must make cheep ones now.  Texting is extremely hard to do.  nobody could here me talking the first day.  The outter screen went blank after a month.  Predictive text usually was only in Spanish.  I wouldn't recommend this phone

Reviews.Title: Bad Phone
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This phone did not last at all. It went from my favorite to my worst phone model. Will never buy again.

Reviews.Title: i didnt like it
Reviews.Author: kray
Reviews.Content: the phone was put together with different pieces that didnt even line up properly and was different shades of grey, when i got it the phone was all glitchy and wouldnt even charge and kept shutting off and flashing, the speaking quality is horrible and the battery barely lasts about 3 hours. definelty not a good buy. I would advise not buying a phone unless you can see it for real first because now i cant return it.

Reviews.Title: Bad
Reviews.Author: nothappy
Reviews.Content: Have been going back and forth with Tmobile for a while now and I cannot get the phone to send or receive picture messages. The phone does not even have all the motorola symbols on it that it should have. Do not buy

Reviews.Title: NOT PLEASE AT ALL
Reviews.Author: Carlene
Reviews.Content: I PURCHASED THIS PHONE FOR A VERY PICKY CLIENT AND RECEIVED THE PHONE IN A VERY OLD USED CASE....NO BOX, NO CHARGER NOT EVEN A MANUAL...WHAT THE HELL!!! NOW I HAVE TO ABSORB THE COST OF THE DAMN PHONE!!! WHAT KIND OF BUSINESS ARE THEY DOING? THE PHONE CAME FROM A GINAMARIE VICTORIA FROM 190 AINSLIE STREET, BROOKLYN, NEW YORK 11211...WHEN THE AD SAID IT WAS Sold by Platinum Galaxy and Fulfilled by Amazon.

Reviews.Title: PRODUCT NOT WHAT WAS ADVERTIZED
Reviews.Author: MONTY
Reviews.Content: ORDERED THIS NPHONE WHILE TRAVELING IN PANAMA. WAS ADVERTIZED AS "NEW" WHEN OPENED , IT WAS CLEARLY A REMANUFACTURED UNIT. IMPRACTICAL TO RETURN IT FROM PANAMA. WE USED IT BUT BEGAN HAVING TROUBLE WITHIN 1 WEEK. AFTER ABOUT A MONTH, SCREEN WENT DIM SO YOU COULD NOT SEE IT IN DAYLIGHT, AND BARELY IN THE DARK. WE WOULD NOT HAVE PURCHASED A REMAN PHONE, PARTICULARLY WHEN WE WERE SO FAR AWAY.

Reviews.Title: Motorola RAZR V3
Reviews.Author: Sureshkumar
Reviews.Content: Hi,I bought this from AMAZON frok this seller.This product stopped working after only 3 days.The Screen doesnt work,The battery cover doent secure properlyThis looks like the seller sells these defective items without warrany.Dont buy any product from this seller.I will complaint Customer services of Amazon to ban this seller from listing his products in AMAZONSuresh

Reviews.Title: Kinda unlocked
Reviews.Author: Electrician
Reviews.Content: The phone was brand new so no problems there, but because the phone was designed for another network, I keep getting error text messages every time I drive by one of their towers.  A non-issue if you have unlimited text.

Reviews.Title: False advertising, Big disappointment
Reviews.Author: Timothy C. Geoffrion
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone to use abroad, since it was advertised as unlocked. However, it was not unlocked and the manufacturer could not unlock it! They've offered to exchange the phone, however they don't ship to Europe. Since that is where I am and where I need the phone, I'm stuck with having shelled out nearly $100 (counting shipping) for a useless phone. Very disappointing and frustrating.

Reviews.Title: Works and looks fine
Reviews.Author: Santosh R. Dulam "Tantoo"
Reviews.Content: I used the product for my international trip and it works just fine. The dark gun metal color definitely catches the eye. Did not find any glitches

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: John L. Didlott "John Lee"
Reviews.Content: I have owned this phone for a couple years and other than having to replace the battery, it has been perfect.  The phone is easy to use and small enough to fit in your pocket but not so small that you cannot see the buttons clearly.  If you are just looking for a phone, this is a great one to have.I have just purchased another one off Amazon as I have given my first Razr to my girlfriend (and I did put a new battery in it for her).

Reviews.Title: Simple to use
Reviews.Author: Mahesh Agarwal
Reviews.Content: Stylish, I used it for long time. The phone has Durable body . It has inside and outside screen. Very simple to use menu.

Reviews.Title: motorola cell phone
Reviews.Author: Howard Stalnecker
Reviews.Content: This phone works fine and my wife loves it, even though the color was somewhat different than I anticipated. Otherwise it works great.

Reviews.Title: NA.. bought this few years back..still good
Reviews.Author: Baski
Reviews.Content: Not applicable for this one.. its a  old purchase.. I think no need to have a review for a retired product.

Reviews.Title: motorola phone
Reviews.Author: smokey
Reviews.Content: I really like my phone has all i need . It was a good price  .Fasr delivery .  Only wish he could of put a new battery in it .I had to buy one  but it was only 3.00

Reviews.Title: old school rules !!!
Reviews.Author: Edison M "Edison M"
Reviews.Content: this cell phone is the best product that i have untill the moment.. the prone came with all the original accesories and work perfectly with any carrier that the vendor said ....

Reviews.Title: Not reliable
Reviews.Author: Sean Arms
Reviews.Content: Nice phone, but died within 4 months. I ditched my iPhone for simplicity reasons, but after going through three flip phones in a year, I'm back to my old iPhone; although it can be consuming, it's very reliable.

Reviews.Title: Quality product
Reviews.Author: A. Mathura "Woodstock"
Reviews.Content: I gave this to a friend as a gift and it work perfectly.  I would recommend this  item to anyone.

Reviews.Title: I have the original and this one is not as good as the old one
Reviews.Author: DARRELL BILLINGTON
Reviews.Content: I received the phone and the delivery as well as the store prompness was spot on. However the phone was cheap. I unpacked it and was disappointed. Not good at all. Sent it back and the store took care of it. Only the looks are like the original the rest glorified plastic and not very functional. On the plus side my daughter found out what I was doing and gave me hers. Apparently years ago she got one for a month then purchased a Blackberry. she had just put hers away. End result I now have a seven year-old phone that is like new.

Reviews.Title: Right on time.
Reviews.Author: KATHRYN J KIMLEL
Reviews.Content: This is my husband's favorite phone.  After his went through the washer for the 2nd time, it died.  We bought the new one, identical to the old one, all the features, functions perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Simple and Reliable !!
Reviews.Author: Jesus Lopez "Darknezz Inc."
Reviews.Content: I order this phone for my dad he likes this styles of phones cause there very simple and reliable !!

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price.
Reviews.Author: Ddee
Reviews.Content: This phone is not a smartphone but a great phone anyway.I have purchased three so far, one for my father and two for myself.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Fred
Reviews.Content: It does what it is supposed to do and not too bad for the price.  I would recomment this product.

Reviews.Title: Cannot download pictures
Reviews.Author: Eric Linse
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone because my old phone was the same and I loved it, But this one came and it was not in English but Italian. I got a friend to fix it but I still cannot download picture on it

Reviews.Title: great rAZAR V3
Reviews.Author: Peter"B"
Reviews.Content: It was a gift ,and my brother is still in love with the flip RazarV3 ,he wont change it for nothing

Reviews.Title: Didn't work.
Reviews.Author: Mabee 221
Reviews.Content: Customer service in regards to a refund: 4 stars. But this came from China and it was not advertised as such. It took almost a month to arrive. And it was clearly refurbished (also, not sold as refurbished), although that was not a problem since it was a low price and in better shape than my current one that I have owned for years. Then the calls started muting out in the middle of conversations. I was able to hear the talkers but they suddenly couldn't hear me. The company answered right away when I requested to return, asking if I wanted a replacement. I responded with a request for refund which they immediately supplied and told me to not send it back to them. Just check very carefully before buying a Razr. They are so hard to find now and there is a lot of junk out there.

Reviews.Title: bad phone
Reviews.Author: blueporsche3
Reviews.Content: this phone is falling apart and does not work with my car bluetooth....it come in with a new box but i think its a refurbish

Reviews.Title: Cell Phone Motorla RAZR V3
Reviews.Author: Gustavo
Reviews.Content: Excellent, smooth received, on time, undamaged, just what I wanted, I'm from Chile and I received the product in a short time, thanks.

Reviews.Title: Battery is bad.
Reviews.Author: romco
Reviews.Content: It's a Good phone but the Battery life is only one minute. Any I charge 8 hours still only one minute use. And I put deference Battery It's works good.

Reviews.Title: Razr V3
Reviews.Author: TICBELL
Reviews.Content: The phone comes with no original power adaptor. The case seems to be not original. The phone was a deception. I will not recomment to buy this seller.

Reviews.Title: Razor from hell
Reviews.Author: ahernone
Reviews.Content: Unfortunutly this phone is a piece of junk, this is my third razor and by far the worse ever! I am very sad.

Reviews.Title: Completely unreliable
Reviews.Author: Liviu I. Nicolaescu
Reviews.Content: This easy to use phone is a giant energy sucking machine.  I had to  charge it every night although I would not use it  more that 20 minutes during the  day. (I takes a few good hours to fully charge.) I replaced the battery and saw  only minor improvements.  One day, when the battery was low  and the phone was beeping  I had to turn it off since I was in a meeting.  That was its last breadth because I could  not turn it on again. Stay away from this piece of crap. If you plan to use it abroad you are better off buying a cheap local phone.

Reviews.Title: Grey Motorola Razr
Reviews.Author: Ada C. Nielsen
Reviews.Content: Sold as unlocked - which it was - but it is also a T-Mobile so I cannot use internet features. Perhaps if I spent hours figuring out how to do this, I could but it isn't worth it to me. Lesson learned for me. Anyway, I don't use this phone now.

Reviews.Title: works well but quality is compromised
Reviews.Author: AA
Reviews.Content: Received the phone in time as promised. This is definitely not the original. Works well, looks new but product quality is questionable.

Reviews.Title: JUNK!
Reviews.Author: Kathleen GAM "Kathleen GAM"
Reviews.Content: I realize this "refurbished" phone was sold "without warranty," however I'd expect it would work at least once.  We received it, went to charge it, and it immecdiately FRIED ITSELF.  It was a piece of unusable junk sold as "refurbished."

Reviews.Title: Won't hold a charge
Reviews.Author: chippers
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone, brand new, not used, on amazon.  Not only does it not hold a charge, but even if it is plugged in to the charger it shows "no charge"!  Won't buy from this site again.

Reviews.Title: This has worked fine ..
Reviews.Author: doogle
Reviews.Content: .. ever since I dropped my original in tub. :)I only use a cellphone for a phone, and this has filled the bill for over eight years now.Works fine with ATT .

Reviews.Title: nice looking phone but died two weeks later
Reviews.Author: V. Moore
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and only used it for about two weeks when the screen went white. The phone rings but you still can't use the screen. As this phone did not have a warranty I now have to buy another phone or pay to have it fixed.

Reviews.Title: razr
Reviews.Author: R. Guerin
Reviews.Content: wont ever buy electronic this way (purchased directly through Amazon, not a reseller).  phone did arrive on time, but has started falling apart within a month.It came without warranty, so there is no recourse.I have no interest in doing business again with crooks.

Reviews.Title: battery backup
Reviews.Author: Amit Shekhawat
Reviews.Content: The battery backup for this phone is really bad. It doest even lasts for a day if you make a couple of calls each of around 10-15 minutes. Apart from that it is OK.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 frequencies and GPRS data capabilities
VGA digital camera (640 x 480) with video capture; 5 MB memory (not expandable)
Bluetooth for handsfree communication; full duplex speakerphone; access to personal email; web browser; SMS/MMS/EMS messaging
Up to 6.67 hours of digital talk time and 250 hours of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola RAZR V3 Unlocked Phone with Camera, and Video Player--International Version with No Warranty (Gun Metal Gray)
